    • Constructor Detail

      • CustomScrollBarUI

        public CustomScrollBarUI(java.awt.Color trackInsideColor,
                         java.awt.Color trackBorderColor,
                         int trackBorderThickness,
                         java.awt.Color thumbInsideColor,
                         java.awt.Color thumbBorderColor,
                         int thumbBorderThickness,
                         int radii)
        Parameters:
        trackInsideColor - defines the color of the area inside the border of the track.
        trackBorderColor - defines the color of the border of the track.
        trackBorderThickness - defines the thickness of the borders of the thumb.
        thumbInsideColor - defines the color of the area inside the border of thumb.
        thumbBorderColor - defines the color of the border of the thumb.
        thumbBorderThickness - defines the thickness of the borders of the thumb.
        radii - defines the curveness of the 4 corners of the thumb and track.
